relation.text: Sunday 7 th May My dear Friend ! by this time you are thanki n g God for Mr Dickenson s
now too a new interest in Taxal & of course new amusement s
do not think of London this year
a day or two -- to day has been a very good day with me -- I am under Farquar 's
married Colonel the Honble Stephen Digby of Richmond Park , brother of Henry first Earl Digby -- in 1790
